divs: sighting detailson 6 november 2012 election night around 11:39pm i was ready to go to sleep so walked to back of dining room area to turn off computer and close curtains as i looked out to my left(east)saw just about parallel to my eyesight what i thought at first were fireworks (-as i walked outside noticed neighbor 2 houses down was outside with balcony lights on and i think she saw this object too-) but was mistaken since this object was as bright as an exploding firework,pulsating and "static" the colors were (top) 1\3 red, (middle)1\3 pinkish and (bottom)1\3 bright white per single semi vertical pulse with bottom area white and occasional blue\green round light at bottom. these pulsating lights were random and looked like police car lights with the difference of them being airborne and more intense,the shape was starlike with the bottom 3rd cutoff like a hand with open fingers and different pulsating lights jumping from middle to left to right to left then left again in a random pattern. i decided to wake my wife up and show her the object which she saw an said it was a star until i pointed out that this star was casting light underneath the clouds clearly as we observed the lights for about 15min a fog like cloud covered it but was still visible so decided to change clothing and find out how far it was. once in truck with my daughter's camera i drove towards end of my street parallel to cloisters car wash as i was going up hill noticed to my left (115-120 degrees)a cluster of bright white lights about 12-15 of them through the bare trees(they looked like they were moving sideways)as i proceeded uphill looked back could not find them and as i arrived towards lancaster avenue couldn't see it anymore and returned to my house without the pictures that i should have taken during this sighting. (will talk to neighbor soon for sighting verification making possible witnesses 3 or more)
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sinking Spring
There were no other sightings in Sinking Spring on or around November 6th 2012
Summary: Starlike Bright/Pulsating then observed closer as a Bunch of White Lights
